songs.title: Sahara
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus : K Ji]
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye

[Verse 1 : Bohemia]
Billo Tere Nakhre Hazaar
Asi Tere Utthe Zindagi Luton Nu Taiyar
Jinna Chr Tu Ni Mani Me V Manni Har
Assi Desiyan Ch Pyar Jive Khoon Ch Samaya
Aaye Kitne Khiladi Mere Warga Ni Aaya
Mere Charche Bathere
Pr Han Ya Na Aage Faisla Ve Tere
Chad Phoka Guroor Teri Ankha Da Kasoor
Mainu Disde Khyaal Sare Tere
Hun Tenu Veteri Kali Zulfan Te Maat Pr
Eda De Moukya Te Sorda Insaan
Assi Dove Jawan Ae Gal Ni Nirali Nale
Bar Khalaudi Navi Gaddi Meri Kaali
Chal Chaliye Duniya De Us Nukhre
Jitthe Banda Na Bande Di Zaat
Te Saari Raat Tere Naal Baike Teriyan Zulfan Sanwara
Billo Mainu Tere Pyar Da Sahara

[Chorus : K Ji]
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye


[Verse 2 : Bohemia]
Yaad De Sahare Maine Din Gujare
Umeed De Sahare Tainu Duro Tak Tak
Tere Kardan Nazare
Mere Yaar Mainu Labde Yaran Nu Lawan Lare
Nale Seene De Vicho Tainu Dil Aawaja Mere
Teri Aankha Aakhan Jive Botla Sharab Di
Zulfu Zulfa Ch Khsboo Gulab Di
Tor Teri Tor Jive MORNI Di Tor
Tere Bad Maine Rabb To Mangna Ni Kuch Hor
Aaja Aaja Meri Or Mere Dilla Di Tu Chor
Nale Sapneya Di Rani Tere Wargi Ni Koi Hor
Kudiyan Hazar Kisse Di Ni Majal
Paya Tu Aakhan Da Jaal Dilwaleya Da Bura Hal
Pyar De Mainu Pyar De De
Ek Wari Ni Wari Wari De De
Hoke Jag To Begana Tere Geet Main Gana
Loki Mere Piche Main Tera Deewana

[Chorus : K Ji]
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye
Sahara Tere Pyar Ka Sahara Chahiye
Deewana Hu Tera Mujhe Pyar Chahiye


[Verse 3 : Bohemia]
Kehan Nu Bohemia De Charche Hazar
Billo Yaar Mere Kehnde Main Tere Piche Khuwar
Billo E-Mail Likhdiyan Kudiyan Batheriyan
Par Mainu Rahe Tere Sandese Da Intzar
Billo Ek Tera Pyar Baki Duniya Bekar
Je Tu Waddeya Shikariya De Waste Taiyar
Aaja Tainu Main Heere Motiyan De Haar Puawan
Har Na Mannan Jo Tu Aakhe Oh Karke DIkhawan
Kehhn Nu Bohemia De Charche Hazar
Billo Yaar Mere Kehnde Maqin Tere Piche Khuwar
Billo E-mail Likhdiyan Kudiyan Batheriyan
Par Mainu Rawe Tere Sandese Da Intzar
Billo Ek Tera Pyar Baki Duniya Bekar
Je Tu Waddeya Shikariya de Waste Taiyar
Aaja Tainu Main Heere Motiyan De Haar Puawan
Har Na Mannan Jo Tu Aakhe Oh KarKe Dikhawan
